1.title: Companion Separated
1.plot: Aliya Tower exploded, Super Bao and friends were thrown to Turkey, they happened to run into the heeler of Kabab whom seizing citizens , mistaking Forsea were caught.

2.title: Italo
2.plot: Italo against Super Bao and others, the guards of Kabab catch the citizens and dodo to Troy, Knight just found gave a hand to the bad guys, he felt ashamed, decided to rescue them with Super Bao.

3.title: The Evil Eye
3.plot: Super Bao and others were caught in training base, they learned about the fact from citizens that Kabab was affected by the evil power to seizing so that enhance their strength . Super Bao and friends were forced to be trained finally.

4.title: Rescue at the Black
4.plot: Choy pretended be badly to escape from the training base with Super Bao and others, Super Bao and Twi run into Mouth when they fled to the small black room,Kabab chased Italo and Choy to the Troy Square.

5.title: Walking with Evil
5.plot: Kabab fight with Super Bao/Twi/Knight/Choy, Super Bao snatched away the evil eye, but overwhelmed by the temptation.

6.title: The Eye of Justice
6.plot: Super Bao attack Choy and others but failed,the crisis all clear when he waked up . But Foresea and others were not in the small black room , Super Bao continue on the journey to find the captain.

7.title: The Realm of the Gods
7.plot: Forsea and Temmery fell from different seas and found a lack of partners. Temmery met Croissant,Forsea met Lamp God. With the guidance of the Lamp God, they decided to go up to the mountain and find Athena to help them find their companion.

8.title: Pirate Croissant
8.plot: Temmery are anti-looting by the Croissant, who found that is posterity of the great pirate. Croissant egg on Temmery to rob the treasure.When Forsea arrived at the Athens acropolis, they were chased and killed as thieves.

9.title: Tricks of the Military Advisor
9.plot: Forsea were captured, Salmon and others escaped,they rescue Forsea with the map, which deliberately given from Croissant, but surrounded by Athena and the guards.

10.title: Magic Boxes of the Treasury
10.plot: Tragic Pirates enter the treasury and open Pandora's box. Athena has become uncontrollable and warlike as losing the shield of wisdom, then internal conflict with Ares, Salmon and others have fled to the treasury and encountered Tragic Pirates.

11.title: Wronged and Trapped
11.plot: Because of the curse of Pandora's box, croissant were defeated by Forsea. Salmon and others people surrounded by Athena and the guards,they were in a desperate situation.

12.title: The Truth Revealed
12.plot: Temmery defraud the lightning halberd against Athena and Forsea,Forsea protect the Athena. Athena has been cleared of all misunderstandings.

13.title: The Secret Inside the Fish
13.plot: Forsea came to a small island, save the old man Gepetto from Tragedy Island, learned that Gepetto is looking for the missing son, everybody ready to lend him a helping hand, the island transfer a whale suddenly, everyone swallowed into the belly.

14.title: Escape from the Whale's Mouth
14.plot: Four Sea and his friends found encountered Viking pirates in the stomach of the whale and also realized that it was those Viking pirates captured Pinochhio. Four Sea and his friends found a way to save Pinochhio out of the whale stomach.

15.title: The Mysterious Castle
15.plot: At twilight Super Bao and his friends came to village, and heard that Helsing Was going to Hack the Night Fury. They followed Helsing to the mysterious castle, wanted to find how would Helsing Was going to Hack the Night Fury.

16.title: Night Fury Revived
16.plot: Helsing was spanked out and the real night Fury was out. Everyone was blaming Helsing. DoDo was bitten and everyone were panic and run away. At the very time, the night fury was coming.

17.title: Day Breaks
17.plot: Now everyone couldn't escape from the night Fury's hunting. Helsing shot a minion with his super chili gun. That reminded Helsing his family arsenal. He went there and got a lot weapon. He defeated the night Fury, Super Bao and others were glad and relieved.

18.title: Gleaming Rose
18.plot: Hellsing found that only a cloth made of gleaming rose could be rolled the night fury. Hellsing and Super Bao sneaked into the castle at daytime. In the very moment when they were looking for the gleaming rose, Choy, Twi was bitten.

19.title: Hunter'S Diary
19.plot: Hellsing used the last gleaming rose made a cloth to fight the night Fury, however, the cloth was useless to the night fury and even worse, the only thing could cope with the night fury was taken, the hunter's diary.

20.title: The Sealing Night
20.plot: All the bitten, villagers and Choy were wakened to attack Super Bao and others. In the time of crisis, Helsing made a trick to lock the night fury in a bottle, with sunlight; he finally sealed the night fury forever.

21.title: The Knight in the Picture
21.plot: Four Seas and friends came to Florence but only to found nobody was there. In an art gallery, they and Tragic Pirate Group were drawn into a painting.

22.title: The Stone Statue of the Lion
22.plot: The world in the painting was ruled by Clown Knight, Armand. His portrayal was damaged during the fight by Four Seas and his friend. Armand thought his dignity was insulted. The only way they can come back to the real world was to pass the Knight's tests. Roli and Temmery were facing the stone One-Horned Lion in the arena.

23.title: The Violent Football Match
23.plot: Salmon and Baoya were facing 3 violent football players and a Referee who was totally black whistle in the football game. They won difficultly.

24.title: The Test in the Leaning Tower
24.plot: ForSea went into a tower, facing the Mysterious Ball and his most difficult puzzles for several hundred years.

25.title: The Story of the Knight
25.plot: Our heroes wined all different kinds of tests and went into another painting. All citizens were captured at here. Long ago when Armand was an artist who wished to be a knight, was laughed by all his fellow artists and they painted a lot of pictures to smear Armand.

26.title: The Escape of the Danger
26.plot: Armand in the portrait was resurgence by his hate. He has drawn all people in the painting. In the end, the Steamers found the sticking points and opened the channel to real word and escaped.

27.title: The Music Competition
27.plot: Super Bao won the Champion in a music competition by accident, moreover, he has been appointed as the new King. Princess CICI showed up and Challenge Super Bao for the throne.

28.title: The Rescue Mission
28.plot: Musician Franz Kidnapped Choy and DoDo. In order to rescue them, the two new enemy Super Bao and Princess CiCi has no choice but fight shoulder to shoulder to against Franz.

29.title: The New King
29.plot: The Rescue plan went ruined because Super Bao and Princess CICI were not cooperating heartfully. Even worse, they let Franz seized the chance to get the magic wand and be the new King.

30.title: Passionate Music
30.plot: With the help of the magic wand, Franz imprisoned not only the old King but also Super Bao and Princess CiCi who was trying to save the King.

31.title: The Powerful Notes
31.plot: Franz turned Super Bao and Princess CiCi into musical notes, however, they learned how to break the magic of Franz's music.

32.title: New year's concert
32.plot: Super Bao and Princess CiCi finally Accepted each other and successfully break Franz's spell and free everyone. Princess CiCi is mature enough to be the new King.

33.title: Counterattack of the "Tragedy"
33.plot: The tragic pirates accidentally got the gun weapon, then to attack the steamer. Two ships started a battle.

34.title: The Warrior's Kingdom
34.plot: Temmery successfully controlled the Steamer, and they want to take over Columbus's ship, but end up caught by Columbus.

35.title: The Duke's Secret
35.plot: Temmery lied that Forsea is the Capitan, Columbus raise the test of the warrior to Temmery, in order to get back the ship, Temmery has to take the test but failed.

36.title: The Windmill Knight
36.plot: Salmon and Cid plan to rescue Forsea, Kui, and Roli who captured by the Pirates, on the other side, Super Bao found the cue to get back the Steamer, he accepted the test of the warrior.

37.title: The Final Trial
37.plot: Super Bao fight with the giant windmill Knight, meanwhile Salmon and Cid are taking another test-Tango to save Forsea and the crews.

38.title: Heading for the City of Dreams
38.plot: Salmon and Duke Cid defeated Temmery and reunion with Forsea and the crew. Super Bao also passes the trial, but the steamer has gone ahead to the city of dreams. They decided to follow its way.

39.title: New Comers
39.plot: Passing by Switzerland, they meet Clock, he is very hospitality and introducing his time-saving business. Twi and Mouth are saving their time and getting older when Super Bao and Choy are not with them.

40.title: Bank of time
40.plot: Choy is heading to the bank and try to find out why. Unfortunately, she faced plenty of obstacles by the clock gear.

41.title: Time Bomb
41.plot: Super Bao and Choy finally break out the gear and burst into the bank's strong room. Clock become furious and leads to a big fight. At last, Super Bao disappears in the time bomb.

42.title: Back to the Past
42.plot: Super Bao finds out his fellows are entering the town so he realizes that he is back to yesterday. To avoid everyone trapped again, Super Bao tries to lead them away and stop Twi and Mouth saving any time.

43.title: Time Saving Machine
43.plot: Super Bao fights with Clock to strive for more future time to his fellows. The Mayor takes the time-saving machine apart from Clock but finds out that is only his comic hard drive.

44.title: Doomsday
44.plot: Super Bao defeats Clock finally. The clock is disintegration in front of Choy and her fellows. Super Bao back to his current time.

45.title: Ocean Park
45.plot: The Steamer sailing at night and encounter a fancy boat, an elegant lady with couple kids are going to a mysterious ocean park. With their kind invitation, the steamer follows them to visit.

46.title: Illusion Tree
46.plot: When they are enjoying themselves, they see Tragedy Pirate is also there. Elaine and the Pirate cooperate together to cheat the kid to the island. They want to use their imagination to nurture the Illusion tree and gain the wish ink. Those written by this wish ink will come true. The Steamer knows the truth so they are caught.

47.title: Wish Ink
47.plot: With the trick played by Roli, the Steamer successfully escapes and knows that Elaine wants to mess up the world with the Wish Ink. The Steamer tries to stop Elaine again but almost thrown out from the ferries wheel by her. At this key moment, JM Star appears.

48.title: Elaine'S Tears
48.plot: The entire ocean park and Elaine are made by JM Star. He accidentally used the Wish Ink to write a story and all came true. Elaine has her own consciousness so she wants to use the Wish Ink to realize her plan. With the help of JM Star, Elaine was defeated and escaped pretending to be regret.

49.title: Vanish Away
49.plot: Elaine is about to set sail with the Wish Ink and makes them trapped in the island. During the fight, the storybook about Elaine is burnt, everything in the fantasy word vanish in a second, the world back to safety again. However, the rest of Wish Ink attained by Temmery.

50.title: Monsters in Town
50.plot: Following the sign, the Steamer arrives a little town looking for Forsea, but find out a monster is destroying the town. Super Bao defeats it but this attracts its owner Temmery.

51.title: Super Warship
51.plot: Temmery landing with the Steamer, he uses the Wish Ink transform the Steamer and himself. Now he is the king of this ocean. He catches Super Bao and his fellows, but at the same time, Forsea is coming by a hot air balloon with the Tragedy hanging there.

52.title: Fight in the Sky
52.plot: Forsea and JM Star save the Steamer's member and the Steamer and Tragedy fight in the sky. Temmery finally defeated and everything written by Wish Ink destroyed. The ship can't fly anymore and they all falling down in the sky.

1.title: Grand Ceremony
1.plot: In order to instruct the "NU WA Recipes" to disciples, Bun Master held a grand ceremony. Unfortunately, the altar and recipes were destroyed by accident. More surprisingly, a ship was found under the altar.

2.title: The Origin of "Steamer
2.plot: They found that, the "Steamer" is the ship which was driven by the ancestors. In order to supplement the destroyed recipes, Forsea, Bao and Roli decided to start their global adventure.

3.title: Sailing
3.plot: In the storm, the steamer-oriented members were flew to a lonely island, and encountered a little dumpling.

4.title: Friendship Building
4.plot: The Steamers had clashed with Choy since some misunderstandings, however, with the misunderstanding were cleared up, Choy introduce Kui to help them fix the destroyed "Steamer", and they picked up the secret of "Steamer".

5.title: Mr. Twi
5.plot: Mr. Twi -- a rich man with lots of charcoals, but mean to everything. He spend a low price to exchange bombs from Roli, and tried to blast the mountain to get the mine.

6.title: Set Sail
6.plot: The mountain was exploded, volcano erupted, the magma swallowed the island. Choy, Kui and Twi lost their homeland, new members of "Steamer" joined.

7.title: Bravery and Courage
7.plot: Steamers saved Ms Spring who is from Vietnam Rice Roll family, they went to Dragon Bay to collect supplies, but unfortunately fell a prey to a plot of Yueng Hong.

8.title: Be in Danger
8.plot: Forsea found the "plot of dragon egg" unexpectedly, " Steamer" members and Rice Roll Family were in danger.

9.title: The Battle of Dragon Bay
9.plot: The plan of " Distraction" display, pirates attack the village, steamer members and villagers had to rise in resistance, but at the same time, Yueng Hong took the occasion to steal the dragon egg.

10.title: Real Dragon
10.plot: The dragon egg was hatched out unexpectedly, the plan of Yueng Hong was ruined.

11.title: The Visitor
11.plot: "Steamer" ship was pull in to shore, disguise villagers "Roasted eggs" set a "White Vengeance", "Steamer" members fell a prey to a plot.

12.title: Strange Odor
12.plot: In order to rescue Choy and others, Bao/Kui and Twi tried to attack the bandits at night, but Grilled lobster Bababen burst in. Luckily, they were saved by a Thai-boxing expert.

13.title: Rescue Tactic
13.plot: Bao and others went to the crater, they found that the only way to rescue Durian Kingdom is exploding the Durian Volcano, so that the bandit can be fumed.

14.title: Tom Yum Kung
14.plot: Volcano erupted, pirates retreated, "Steamer" members finally get the "Steamer" back. Another " Victor Rush" broke up.

15.title: Pain of Treant
15.plot: "Steamer" buddies successfully saved Hangtua from the sorcerer, but unfortunately, they arrested Twi.

16.title: Moon Wand
16.plot: With the guide of old treant, Bao pretended to be a wooden bench and tried to get the wand from sorcerer, but at the moment, the sorcerer was awaken by " Mr. Hat", Bao is in danger.

17.title: Burnt Out the Magic
17.plot: Bao landed in sorcerer's "Exchange" trap, luckily Choy arrived in time. The Mana burn out, the sorcerer had to touch the moon to get more sorcery.

18.title: The Intangible Moon
18.plot: In the last moment, sorcerer was defeated, the curse was removed.

19.title: Mysterious Island
19.plot: An "Island" blocked the way, in order to find out another way, Steamers went to the island, but earthquake occurred, at the moment of people panic to escape, a big hand caught Bao.

20.title: Giant Island
20.plot: They found that the island was originally a giant. Another rescue battle broke out.

21.title: Sushi Man
21.plot: No discord, no concord. Bao met the trapped Sushi man in giant's ear. They tried to escape, but failed.

22.title: Out of Strait
22.plot: Bao and Sushi collaborate from within with forces from "Steamer", they finally escaped, Sushi man join the adventure.

23.title: Hit by Icy
23.plot: Steamers fell in to the trap of violent sea snail. "Steamer"ship was frozen, the pasta buddies were turned to be ice statues by sea snail. At the moment of escaping, another unexpected trap they fell.

24.title: The Frozen Village
24.plot: Finally they found that the trap was set up the survivor Ahmad, all their villagers were frozen by the violent sea snail, and they occupied the whole village. Ice-breaking war is unavoidable.

25.title: Snow Ball Plan
25.plot: The KUNG FOOD crew explores the frozen village, crossing paths with a group of thieves.

26.title: War of Ice-breaking
26.plot: Can the KUNG FOOD crew escape the frozen village? First, they need to break out of their frozen statues.

27.title: Island Standoff
27.plot: One of the crew is missing on board the KUNG FOOD ship. Or is he?

28.title: Mysterious Aboriginals
28.plot: The receding tide stopped the pirates so that they can only use the boat to attack. At the same time, Twi and Forsea went ashore to search for the supplies, but unfortunately, they fell into a trap.

29.title: Worshipping Ceremony
29.plot: The pirates change the tactics, but it's still not working. The fight resulted in a stalemate, Mr. Twi was pushed into the fire pit. When the tide's in, Pirates came as well.

30.title: Advent Rising
30.plot: The "Steamers" were captured by the pirates, Twi, who is named as "Mr. God", led his aboriginals defeated the pirates.

31.title: Real & Fake Bao
31.plot: Temmery pirates cope with flying globefishes, air raid "Steamer", Steamers are too weak to defend, Choy was captured, " Steamer" ship was dragged to the "City of Sky".

32.title: Difficile True
32.plot: The escaping Steamers met Rajib, they found that the curry man is not the pirates' partner, but the sufferer. However, Rajib is not willing to help because of his treasures.

33.title: Castle in the sky
33.plot: Steamers set free Choy, and back to "Steamer ship", but greedy Twi were found by the fellows of globefish.

34.title: Steamers set free Choy, and back to "Steamer ship", but greedy Twi were found by the fellows of globefish.
34.plot: A castle in the sky is the site of full-fledged battle for the Steamer's crew. Will they escape the clouds to safety?

35.title: True and Fake Super Bao
35.plot: Dough transformed to be Bao and made troubles in the market so that steamers were framed.

36.title: Pirates' Different Faces
36.plot: In order to provide relief to Bao who is poisoned by the villagers, Forsea and others chased the Dough to the beach, but he transformed to be" Forsea", Real or Fake, it's a problem they need to find out, steamers are in a jam.

37.title: Faces in Disguise
37.plot: The Dough managed to escape, together with Temmery pirates, arrested village leader and transform to be the "leader", leading innocent villagers captured the steamers.

38.title: Sorting out
38.plot: Finally, the Dough showed himself in his true face, harried the village. At the moment they left, Bao took the leader to break prison, saved Forsea and others, finally won the fight.

39.title: Terrible electric eel
39.plot: Steamers were shocked by the electric eel in the Persian Gulf. "Steamer" ship disappeared in a sudden.

40.title: Back to the past
40.plot: Steamers found that the magic lamp can help them go back to the future, but eel and little Temmery got the news as well.

41.title: The birth of electric eel
41.plot: The eel found the magic lamp, got the power to be a real electric eel, then steamers were shocked to the further past.

42.title: Chrono Cross
42.plot: Electric Eel will stop at nothing to show off his newfound powers. Whether it's tossing around electric bolts or breaking out in bolts, the KUNG FOOD crew is going to have their hands full.

43.title: Berman Town
43.plot: Steamers cannot stand the bandits' criminal activities and tried to set free the natives from the evils, but unexpectedly they were besieged by the bandits.

44.title: Fake Ambassador
44.plot: Kui pretended to be an ambassador, blended in with the robbers' palace, unexpectedly found that the bottle is extremely powerful, but Bao and others had sieged the palace at that time.

45.title: The Bottle
45.plot: Bao and others sieged the palace but were suck by the bottle.

46.title: The Bandit's Last Day
46.plot: Forsea took a gamble, he drove the "Steamer" ship, cross the sandstorm, struck bandits' lair.

47.title: Sleeping City
47.plot: When the Steamers first came to Dubai, the villages are out of spirit in the day for they break down their own houses to build something at a secret palace in the night. The Steamers all fell into sleep except Simon, and then break the ship to go with the villagers. Simon tries to stop them.

48.title: Sleepwalking Crisis
48.plot: When everyone wakes up in the morning, Simon told them what had happened. They follow Simon to go to the base and they find out a shaken secret-someone is using the sleeping bug to control the villagers to make them build a splendid ship.

49.title: Mysterious Dream
49.plot: The Steamers follow a sleeping bug to a strange place and then meet with a stronger and bigger vision sleeping bug. They are defeated and caught in a dark house.

50.title: Awake from a Dream
50.plot: The crew sees the truth that the place actually is a dream, all the illusion is forming from the fear. They overcome the fear and get out of there. They also find out the true manipulator-Nightmare octopus and subdue him. The villagers are awake; the ship became a public facility.

51.title: Pirate Queen
51.plot: Tragedy pirates asked for help from the Queen jellyfish to deal with steamers, she was really overwhelming, steamers were captured.

52.title: Prison Break
52.plot: Steamers broke prison and escape the "Steamer" ship, Fina found that her efforts were completely ruined in the last moment, another war is poised.

1.title: Under the Ruins of Return
1.plot: Having been captured by Fina, Choy jumped into the Ruin of Return, in order not to encumber her fellows. With indignation, the people fought Fina fiercely, but they were all bumped into Ruin of Return.

2.title: Battle After Rebirth
2.plot: Members of Steamer, who had fallen into Ruin of Return, encountered Nv Wa, the goddess who had created the world and thus gained their new bodies and power. They broke out of Ruin of Return and fought a decisive battle with Fina.

3.title: New Journey
3.plot: With their new power, members of Steamer finally defeated Fina. However, Nv Wa assigned them a new task. The unknown adventure of Steamer will continue to go on.

4.title: First Landing
4.plot: Having passed Ruin of Return, members of Steamer and Tragic Pirates found themselves on a new continent.

5.title: Millennial Seal
5.plot: Tragic Pirates ventured into a holy temple by mistake and removed a millennium-old seal on Wajite, a Noodle Demon. And Choy, who just entered into a village, was attacked by villagers who mistaken her for Noodle Demon.

6.title: Possessed by Noodle Demon
6.plot: Wajite possessed Bucktooth and went to Steamer, in an attempt to recover her body with hot water. Members of Steamer arrived in time and crushed the plot.

7.title: Choy in Danger
7.plot: Choy fought with Wajite for the control of her own body to no avail. After resuming her energy, Wajite led Tragic Pirates to vie for the key to the pyramid.

8.title: Missing an Opportunity
8.plot: When Wajite vied for the key to the pyramid, the people, who were not hardhearted enough to hurt Choy, let Wajite pass the traps in the pyramid.

9.title: A Gleam of Hope
9.plot: Wajite got the key to the pyramid and headed for it. Members of Steamer chased her in a hurry.

10.title: Fatal Crisis
10.plot: Making use of the traps in the pyramid, Wajite trapped members of Steamer and regained her body in the pyramid.

11.title: Final Battle in Tomb
11.plot: Roli bombed the chamber where they were trapped. The people fought a final battle with Wajite and defeated her.

12.title: Sailfish the Knife
12.plot: Salmon felt sick for several days and Steamer pulled into the shore. Then Sailfish appeared and his elegant demeanor impressed the people. After gaining Salmon's ice saber by cheating, Sailfish didn't hide his real intention any more.

13.title: Caught in Danger
13.plot: Temmery chased Super Bao followed up the victory and captured him latter. Forsea and Salmon scare Temmery and his fellows away with the help of villagers.

14.title: Ice Crystal on the Holy Mountain
14.plot: Forsea learned from the villagers that there are Ice Crystals on the Holy Mountain and it could relieve Salmon from his fragility. When they were about to get Ice Crystal, a mysterious person appeared suddenly and attacked Salmon.

15.title: Samurai of Double Knives
15.plot: When the misunderstanding between them was cleared up, they knew that the mysterious person named Wudumu, who is Sailfish's teacher and that he had been trapped on the mountain because of Sailfish's plot. With Ice Crystal, Wudumu helped Salmon solved his defect of fearing heat. He also taught Salmon the martial skills of using two sabers and gave his own sabers to Salmon as a gift.

16.title: The Third Saber
16.plot: After gaining his ice saber, Salmon fought Sailfish with two sabers. But he was hurt unexpectedly by the third saber of Sailfish----Nose Saber. And Forsea also failed to save his fellows.

17.title: Strike Back in Desperation
17.plot: Super Bao and his fellows succeeded in breaking prison and hastily went to help Salmon. In order to enable his teacher to get down to mountain, Salmon kept his promise and decided on battling Sailfish on his own. Finally, Salmon thrown out his mustard and defeated Sailfish.

18.title: Feast of Poisonous Fruits
18.plot: Super Bao broke the mast, stayed and repaired it with Kui. Forsea and other people were welcomed by a few villagers warmly on shore. After eating their fruits, they felt feeble. Then Temmery appeared. The fact was that those so-called villagers were actually followers of Zulafa, his new boss.

19.title: Hero Kabu
19.plot: On hearing the rumble of explosion, Kui and Super Bao hurried to help. But they couldn't battle against the heavy odds and escaped to a village. The villagers, who mistook them for followers of Zulafa, captured them. When the misunderstanding was cleared up, they learned that Zulafa occupied the Tree of Life and extorted its energy. Kabu, a villager, led the two people to rescue their fellows.

20.title: Deluged with Traps
20.plot: The three of them were tempted into an underground maze where there was massive ambush. Followers of Zulafa made use of Kabu and led Super Bao and Kui into a trap.

21.title: Tree Spirit Led the Way
21.plot: Temmery wanted to drive Steamer away stealthily but got trapped. He accidentally released Super Bao and his fellows. At the same time, Choy and some other people were suffering a lot. Super Bao arrived in time and rescued them.

22.title: Awakening of Black Diamond
22.plot: Kabu was trapped again. When the people were on their way to rescue him, they broke into the control cabin of Zufala by chance. At the moment, the Energy Stone was about to awake and endowed Zufala with supreme energy. Desperate Kabu was rescued by village head and other villagers. When they hurried to the control cabin, the ultrasonic wave released by Zufala was about to damage the maze.

23.title: Battle on the Treetop
23.plot: The people and the villagers came out of the collapsed maze and found that Tree of Life had perished and the island was about to sink. Zufala wanted to conquer the world on Steamer. The people and the villagers fought with him violently. Super Bao smashed the Energy Stone. The energy returned and the Tree of life finally recovered.

24.title: Cape in Fog
24.plot: Because of the plot of Malu and Tragic Pirates, Steamer stranded in Cape of Good Hope. Temmery launched an assaulted and he was defeated.

25.title: Mussel Pirates
25.plot: Malu occupied Steamer and captured the people. Choy was rescued by Bantu, a lighthouse keeper, and allied with him.

26.title: Fatal Ship Wreck
26.plot: When Malu was repairing the ship, Choy and Bantu came to rescue the people and steal the diamonds. But both of them were captured.

27.title: Race of Speed
27.plot: Malu boarded Steamer and left. Members of Steamer, who had been imprisoned in the lighthouse, escaped. The lighthouse was bombed.

28.title: Breaking Through Fog
28.plot: The escaped people, guided by the diamond of lighthouse keeper, drove Tragedy to chase Malu.

29.title: Steamer Retaken
29.plot: Overcoming all difficulties, members of Steamer finally defeated Malu and his followers and regain the ship.

30.title: Mysterious Mask
30.plot: When an aboriginal sacrifice was interrupted by an orangutan, Super Bao knocked off Orangutan's mask in panic. And the mask fell on Steamer.

31.title: Rebelling wrymouth
31.plot: After wearing the mask, Wrymouth got quite abnormal. When the people came around, Wrymouth defeated them by using the strength of the mask.

32.title: Return of Boss
32.plot: Temmery snatched Wrymouth's mask, led Tragic Pirates to defeat members of Steamer and occupied the ship.

33.title: Mask Retaken
33.plot: Temmery decided on occupying the tribe. Members of Steamer planned with the tribe inhabitants regained the mask. But Dodo put on the mask.

34.title: Advent of Devil
34.plot: Wearing the mask, Dodo turned into a little demon and made the Tragic Pirates embarrassed.

35.title: Unexpected Ending
35.plot: Members of Steamer and Tragic Pirates struggled hand in hand, in an effort to remove Dodo's mask, but to no avail. When they felt desperate, something surprising happened and backfired the plot.

36.title: Evil Wind in Dryland
36.plot: Members of Steamer were attacked by Hamadan, a crazy musician, and blown away by magic wind.

37.title: Youngman Daye
37.plot: While Steamer chased after Temmery, Temmery was scared off by the members of Steamer with the help of Daye.

38.title: Destructed oasis
38.plot: Hamadan and his followers tried to besiege and eradicate the village. The villagers were captured, wells were destroyed and the oasis where the village was located was ruined. Led by Daye, members of Steamer managed to escape.

39.title: Wasteland Exploration
39.plot: While escaping and fighting, members of Steamer tried to uncover the secrets of Hamadan's magic horn, but to no avail. Then they were besieged by Hamadan's henchmen.

40.title: Choice of Kui
40.plot: Kui decided to sacrifice himself, in order to gain more time for his fellows. However, after he was surrendered, Hamadan still called a halt to attack.

41.title: Fight Back from Impasse
41.plot: During a violent battle, Daye fell underground and found the music notation. With joint efforts, people and Daye defeated Hamadan and snatched the magic horn. Daye restored the oasis by playing music with the horn.

42.title: Kind Scorpion
42.plot: When the people reached Sahara, Temmery, together with a poisonous scorpion, came to revenge against them. The people were defeated and escaped by riding the scaring camels.

43.title: Water Shortage
43.plot: Covered by herdsmen, members of Steamer escaped from the searching and chasing of Tragic Pirates. Salmon hid under a camel of Tragic Pirates, he is trying to get some water from their camp.

44.title: Desert Mystery
44.plot: When seeking water in poisonous scorpions' base, Salmon was noticed by them. After a battle, Salmon was defeated.

45.title: Illusion
45.plot: Herdsmen offered fresh water, with which members of Steamer recovered. They went to poisonous' base to look for Salmon. To their surprise, they bumped into Fierce Conch from Heaven Town.

46.title: Powerful Enemy Reappears
46.plot: It was a strenuous task for members of Steamer to defeat Fierce Conch. However, Fina, the pirates' Queen and Sailfish appeared again, because they were also tempted into the illusion by the poisonous scorpion.

47.title: Surprising Victory by Camels
47.plot: Super Bao was knocked out of the illusion because of Crosseye's mistake. He then found the secrets. Making use of camels, he helped his fellows to break through the illusion. They defeated the poisonous scorpions and regain the water sources for herdsmen.

48.title: Strange Construction Site
48.plot: When Steamer pulled to the shore, its members found an odd construction site. A sorcerer, the new boss of Tragic Pirates, turned up and tried to force the people to work for him. The sorcerer also dispatched his three henchmen ahead. They are three snakes name Joy, Anger and Sorrow respectively.

49.title: Hypnotic Stick
49.plot: When haggling with the three snakes, Super Bao and his fellows were all bitten and then captured. Finally Roli led Salmon and Forsea out of the besieging circle. Roli and her fellows hid in the construction site and waited for opportunities of rescuing other people. However, hypnotized Super Bao and other people attacked them unexpectedly.

50.title: Glass Prisoners
50.plot: Roli and other two people escaped after making arduous efforts. Then, they hid in a secret room in the sorcerer's den. To their astonishment, they found an imprisoned tribe head, who told them about the sorcerer's evil plan of conjuring the lost nation.

51.title: Geographic Rune
51.plot: When the sorcerer began his conjuring ritual, Roli and the tribe head arrived and stopped him. Everyone tried to snatch the hypnotic stick. After a battle, the sorcerer got the stick and finished the ritual.

52.title: Poseidon drea
52.plot: When the ground formation was put to use, Lvmanba, Tragic Pirates and members of Steamer were all taken to mysterious Poseidia. The people all followed Lvmanba and entered the Ali Tower. But they encountered Sobeck, a battling machine controlled by Tragic Pirates.

53.title: Magic Circle
53.plot: When the sorcerer was about to launch the power-absorbing device on the top of the tower, the people reached the second floor of the magic tower and fiercely fought the three henchmen of the sorcerer with their magic skills. Finally Forsea was knocked into a magic formation. And his sad fellows rushed to the third floor.

54.title: Crysis
54.plot: Lvmanba conjured Hercules, the super Poseidian warrior, aiming at rebuilding the world. Members of Steamer couldn't rival the warrior. And the doomsday was about to befall.

55.title: We Are the World
55.plot: Enlightened by Ali, God of Poseidia, Forsea and Steamer crew used a magic skill called "Unity of Seas" and defeated Hercules. Although Lvmanba's dream of his empire had been crushed, members of Steamer were taken to another unknown continent by the power of the mysterious nation.

-1.title: War in the clouds
-1.plot: A castle in the sky is the site of full-fledged battle for the Steamer's crew. Will they escape the clouds to safety?

imdb.plot outline: This is a magical world inhabited by living food items with hidden talents. There is Salmon (a tough sushi warrior), Super Bao (a steamed stuffed bun), Twi (a deep-fried dough sticks), Choy (noodles), Kui (a sesame seed cake), Roli (a steamed twisted roll) and Dodo (a dumpling). Together, these friends follow Captain Forsea, a steamed bun who cannot swim, and embark on an Age of Exploration in the world of foods. Piloting a ship named The Steamer, they travel to different countries and experience foreign lifestyles. Occasionally they are involved in hilarious misunderstandings due to differences in local customs, but mostly they help good foods fight against local evil forces and foil the evil pirates' schemes again and again. Wherever they go, they sow the seeds of peace and friendship. Despite minor quarrels between the members of this expedition, they overcome all kinds of untold difficulties and march onward, all the time relying on stalwart convictions and supreme courage.
imdb.title: Kungfood
plot: This is a magical world inhabited by living food items with hidden talents. There is Salmon (a tough sushi warrior), Super Bao (a steamed stuffed bun), Twi (a deep-fried dough sticks), Choy (noodles), Kui (a sesame seed cake), Roli (a steamed twisted roll) and Dodo (a dumpling). Together, these friends follow Captain Forsea, a steamed bun who cannot swim, and embark on an Age of Exploration in the world of foods. Piloting a ship named The Steamer, they travel to different countries and experience foreign lifestyles. Occasionally they are involved in hilarious misunderstandings due to differences in local customs, but mostly they help good foods fight against local evil forces and foil the evil pirates' schemes again and again. Wherever they go, they sow the seeds of peace and friendship. Despite minor quarrels between the members of this expedition, they overcome all kinds of untold difficulties and march onward, all the time relying on stalwart convictions and supreme courage.
synopsis:
This is an adventure story about the food from all over the world.
The story happened in the old eastern china, the traditional Chinese food sail with the traditional Japanese food to all over the world.
The story included 5 continents, also took in several of different culture and food. All the food described by lively animation image. As the people enjoy the funny story, at the mean while, they already travelled all over the world. In the magic food world, different food must survival on the different surroundings ;( PS: Dumpling must survival in the hot water) Every kind of food has their own characteristic. Although all the food made by the goddess-Nv Wa. All the food description was recorded at the Nv Wa recipe. In a remote island named Flour Village, all the villagers are made of food. Clan elder of Steamer Religion Master Mantou-Bun and his three naughty apprentices named Forsea (mantou) Bao (steam bun) and Roli(steamed twisted roll)etc live here. On the grandest ceremony, the Nv-Wa recipe was destroyed by accident, in order to supplement the recipe; this group of food followed their Landlubber Captain Forsea (Steam bun), drove their "Steamer", and started their adventure journey around the world... On the journey, they met the other four Chinese traditional foods: dumplings-Dodo, noodle-Choy, fried bread stick-Twi, clay oven rolls-Kui and one Sushi-Salmon. They went to different countries, experienced different culture, encountered with evils, made new friends, and collected new recipes. Wherever they arrived, they used their wisdom and Kungfu to defeat bandits and pirates. They helped the local people, overcome the risks and dangers, spread their culture, friendship and peaceful mind...
